long_description:
You enter a large open room with one lone server rack at the center. Hundreds of cables from
throughout the building all converge on this one machine. It has one monitor on a desk,
with a keyboard and a chair. It looks like any other computer, but something inside you
knows that it is anything but ordinary. You see one empty ethernet port in front of you.

short_description: You are in a rooftop attic.
name: Attic
